programme.desc: Claw sends Talon to steal a cloning device so he can duplicate his best henchman, but instead Talon clones himself.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep11
programme.desc: The girls lose their baseball in Mojo Jojo's house and are forced to retrieve it themselves.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep38
programme.desc: In a continuation of #669-012, Ben travels into space and with Gwen and Max to thwart Ghostfreak's grand plan of plunging Earth into eternal darkness.

programme.title: Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends Ep03
programme.desc: When 8-yr-old Mac is forced to give up his Imaginary Friend Bloo, they find Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends, an amazing house for unwanted Imaginary Friends.

programme.title: Scooby Doo! and the Wwe: Curse of the Speed Demon Ep01

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who? Ep01
programme.desc: When Scooby and the gang come to Gotham City to visit Alfred Pennyworth, they stumble into a dangerous mystery! Alfred's been kidnapped by the Man-Bat! Batman is on the case and he does not want any help

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep31
programme.desc: After a Giant Houndbeast attacks an elite dog show, the gang goes undercover and enters Scooby in the show in order to solve the mystery.

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep04
programme.desc: Bugs and Daffy quickly discover that Yosemite Sam is a less-than-perfect houseguest when they are forced to take him in during a rainstorm. But how to get him to leave?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show Ep287
programme.desc: Papa tells his version of the Jack and the Beanstalk story.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep09
programme.desc: The turtles are struck by lightning during a storm, turning them into positively charged projectiles zapping everything they touch and setting off all the appliances in the house.

programme.title: Pat the Dog Ep218

programme.title: Yabba Dabba Dinosaurs Ep25
programme.desc: Bamm-Bamm meets a caveman who lives out in the Crags and decides he wants to live like he does.

programme.title: Barbie Dreamhouse Adventure Ep14

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show Ep288
programme.desc: The gang get more than they bargained for when they try to shoo away a seemingly docile spider.

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep52

programme.title: Bunnicula Ep104
programme.desc: The ghosts and ghouls of the Orlock are spooked when suddenly a mysterious visitor appears revealing a tie to Bunnicula's past.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep113
programme.desc: Sylvester, Claude, and Pete Puma attempt to steal food from Granny's house. Her pet dog Frisky Puppy spoils their plans.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep10

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Essie Lin Chia plays an evil lady warrior who raises the son of a swordsman who scorned her with a blood-curdling ulterior motive in mind.

programme.title: The House of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: This fascinating, humorous box office smash captures a cross-section of Hong Kong society and their issues -- all crammed into a single tenement building.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: This comedy centres on the residents of a females-only apartment who hail from different backgrounds and make money in varied ways.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: One of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screen, this classic stars the husband-and-wife team of Peter Chen and Betty Loh.

programme.title: The Naval Commandos
programme.desc: Tony Liu, Ti Lung, Fu Sheng, David Chiang and Shih Szu star in this rousing epic of a near suicidal mission to destroy the Japanese Navy's flagship in 1937.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: This epic depicts the romance between the Jade Emperor's seventh daughter and a young village man. When Heaven and Earth meet, can a common ground be found?

programme.title: Judgement of an Assassin
programme.desc: This tale of the 100 Poison Clique's obsessive ambition to destroy all rivals climaxes in a bloody clash involving a mass murderer's trial.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: Winner of Best Picture in the 12th Asian Film Festival, this Huangmei Opera epic stars Li Li Hua and Ivy Ling Po in a romance that stretches across the decades.

programme.title: All Men Are Brothers
programme.desc: This sequel depicts how the brothers of the Water Margin embark on a hunt for the thieves. Will they succeed and if so, at what cost?

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: This classic romance stars Linda Lin and Kwan Shan, capturing a touching love story between a famous nightclub singer and a young architect.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Fans of 'The Little Mermaid' are in for a delightful surprise when they see this spectacular Chinese operatic adaptation, where a carp turns into a fairy.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: Superstars Ti Lung and David Keung team up for in this 71' classic about a young man who is exiled after his godfather's death, but returns with a vengeance.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: In this chapter of the 'Journey to the West' saga, the Monkey King and his gang are confronted by a whole host of fanciful villains.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Following the lives of three downtrodden, but resilient outcasts, John Lo Mar's gritty social drama paints a sense of realism rarely seen in Hong Kong movies.

programme.title: Clan of the White Lotus
programme.desc: A hero (Gordon Liu Chia hui) must learn 'Embroidery Fist' and acupuncture to counter a villain's (Lo Lieh) deadly fight techniques.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: In this twist-filled action film, a country girl is saved by a hero and remains coveted by her jilted lover.

programme.title: The Web of Death
programme.desc: A traitorous clansman bids to locate and then unleash the deadly 'Five Venom Spider' against those who bid to stand in his way.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: If you liked House of 72 Tenants, you won't want to miss out on this humorous, fun-filled sequel complete with 10 more tenants!

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: In this award-winning classic, a beauty disguises herself as a boy to attend school yet tend to her lover. Stars Lo Ti, Ling Po.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: When deadbeats Ming and Liang stumble upon records of scandals involving government officials, what follows is a humorous misadventure of epic proportions.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: A young man and his sifu earn a living as pseudo-ghost catchers until his sifu is arrested and an honest gal becomes his new companion.

programme.title: Men From the Gutter
programme.desc: From its evocative title to its gritty filming and gutsy plot, this sizzling crime thriller strikes a chord with audience round the world.

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: A swordsman (David Chiang) is moved to fight back after the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend murdered by a gang.

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Ling Yun of 'Hellgate' plays a magician-warrior who unwittingly protects a villain from an ambush, until his wife and friend's deaths open his eyes.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: At first, a gang just wants the village locksmith to open a stolen safe, but it soon escalates into wholesale torment when they are met with resistance.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: When an argument gets out of hand between a regular Joe and a wealthy businessman, regular Joe finds himself thrust into the middle of a high stakes wager!

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A trio of heroes go up against a power-hungry Ming Dynasty official and also cross paths with three beauties.

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a happy plus-sized girl working as a mascot at a theme park. However, when a weight loss competition turns her into a vain internet icon, she begins to lose the people she loves.

programme.title: Bio Raiders
programme.desc: A famed doctor concocts an elixir of immortality to save his terminally ill daughter, but it involves drinking human blood. Twenty years later, the doctor's assistant makes a terrifying discovery.

programme.title: Xiao Ming & His Buddies
programme.desc: This heart-warming comedy will have you shedding tears of laughter. While burglarizing a bungalow, Liu Bei and his gang of dim-witted thieves meet their match in little Xiao Ming and his friends.

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 3
programme.desc: Karen Mok reprises her iconic character after two decades in this tale of a girl who tries to redirect fate to ensure she & her true love stay alive.

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: Jackie Chan's highest box office masterpiece! This one billion global box office hit depicts an archeology professor and his team in search of a lost ancient Indian treasure.

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: This drama revolves around five people living at a peaceful home for the elderly, managed by a retired doctor with assistance from his long-time nurse.

programme.title: With Prisoners
programme.desc: Starring Neo Yau and Kelvin Kwan, this Hong Kong movie portrays young inmates are physically and mentally abused daily in a detention centre.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: Winner of 9 awards at the 32nd Hong Kong Film Awards! When a police van is hijacked, Deputy Commissioner M.B Lee launches a rescue operation codenamed Cold War.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel features the plight of Hong Kong's grassroots performing artists fighting against the government's plan to gentrify an industrial district where they lived.

programme.title: The Bravest Escort Group
programme.desc: This historical drama follows a band of courageous bodyguards as they set out to escort the General Ma Bao's daughter Yuanyuan & her son - the Ming Dynasty's last hope, to safety.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Alex Fong pairs up with a new partner, Cecilia So, in this film after breaking up with Stephy Tang. Will this spark new life into director Patrick Kong's love series, or spoil the love mythology?

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: This Singaporean-Malaysian comedy starring Chapman To & Mark Lee revolves around Tin Ba, whose winning streak inspires him to challenge the King of Mahjong in the world championship.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A special needs teacher who has a brother with a disability goes on an unexpected journey of self-discovery when he and his friends take part in a musical they deem to be a waste of time.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk, Dragon Return
programme.desc: Ji Gong forms an alliance with people from all walks of life to save humanity. Battle-hardened General Gao dare not marry his childhood sweetheart and turns to Ji Gong for help but things go awry.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: An inept kidnapper has the table turned on him by the wily businessman he kidnaps, and is coerced into doing his bidding. How will the story end for the captor and the captive?

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: An undercover police who infiltrated the triad and a triad mole planted into the police force must work together to survive the cutthroat underworld.

programme.title: A Wedding Invitation
programme.desc: A girl, who turns down a marriage proposal from her suitor, enters into a contract with him stating that they will reunite in five years - should they both still be single.

programme.title: The Founding of an Army
programme.desc: This HKFA nominee tells the epic story behind the founding of the People's Liberation Army in China that ultimately laid the foundation for a new republic. Featuring 60 all-star cast members!

programme.title: Viral MH000991
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, this chilling Thai tale depicts how a gamer captures a spirit photo that she shares with friends - only to release the spirit that begins to haunt them all.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: This Singaporean-Malaysian comedy starring Chapman To & Mark Lee revolves around Tin Ba, whose winning streak inspires him to challenge the King of Mahjong in the world championship.

programme.title: Special Female Force
programme.desc: Shot in Malaysia, this action comedy starring Eliza Sam, Joyce Cheng & Jeana Ho sees six female police recruits developing a bond as they bust crime in bikinis.

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: Winner of the Palme d'Or at the Cannes Film Festival. A shoplifter comes across a little girl in the freezing cold, whom his wife agrees to take in. But what secrets is the girl hiding?

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: A demoted super cop who has become overweight receives a lifeline to save his career and win back his ex-fiancee when he is tasked to repatriate a Japanese fugitive.

programme.title: Line Walker
programme.desc: Nominated as New Director in 2017 HKFA, Sharmaine Sheh is back with newly joint Nicky Cheung, Louis Koo and Francis Ng in the search for the 6th undercover!

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: This modern-day Cinderella story brings together a man and a woman, who not only come from different worlds but get off on the wrong foot. Will their differences ruin their chance at love?

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: A paralyzed & depressed HK divorcee meets his new Filipino domestic worker, who has put her dream on hold to earn a living. As each grapple with their own demons, life begins to heal them.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: Mad Max is swept up in a high-octane road war with a group of rebels fleeing from a ruthless warlord in this Oscar-winning fourth instalment .

programme.title: What's Your Number?
programme.desc: Fearing that she is going to be alone forever, Ally goes on a quest to reconnect with her former lovers, searching for the best 'ex' of her life.

programme.title: Radioactive
programme.desc: Radioactive is the incredible, true story of Marie Curie, a fiercely passionate scientist, who struggles to progress her ground-breaking research, despite her obvious brilliance.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set S1 Ep933
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of three major motion pictures per week; catch action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: By night, a blind attorney turns into a powerful, masked vigilante with a 'radar sense' that allows him to 'see' with superhuman capabilities.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning Rocky franchise sees former heavyweight champion Rocky Balboa steps out of retirement and back into the ring again.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Hobbs assembles an elite racing team to challenge and take down a group of mercenary drivers!

programme.title: The Invisible Man (2020)
programme.desc: After Cecilia escapes from a controlling relationship, her abusive ex-boyfriend commits suicide. She's sanity then unravels due to a series of eerie coincidences and the presence of someone nobody can see.

programme.title: Boss Level
programme.desc: Former Special Forces soldier Roy Pulver urgently needs to figure out why he is stuck in a repeating time loop in which he is killed violently in different ways every day.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: Follow the minion trio as they venture out into the world to find a new evil boss for their brethren to follow.

programme.title: G.I. Joe : the Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: An elite military unit, comprising special operatives known as G.I. Joe, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: The G.I. Joes must once again face their mortal enemy Cobra while contending with threats within the government.

programme.title: Who's by Your Side S1 Ep05
programme.desc: The ten-episode one-hour series explores relationship issues and marital challenges, and depicts painful dilemmas for the characters through a unique lens on their daily lives.

programme.title: Tenet
programme.desc: Armed with only one wordTenetand fighting for the survival of the entire world, the Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage.

programme.title: Kick-Ass 2
programme.desc: Kick-Ass inspires a new wave of self-made masked crusaders, who become the target of the reborn Red Mist.

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: Rebecca and Martin both faced the same terrifying events that threatened their safety and sanity and is returning with a vengeance to torment the entire family.

programme.title: The Way I See it
programme.desc: A rare glimpse inside the American presidency through the unique lens of former Chief Official White House Photographer, Pete Souza.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: Finding himself wanted by the FBI and the mob, a streetwise boy enlists the help of a lawyer to help him navigate the sea of single-minded prosecutors and protect him from the mobsters' reprisals.

programme.title: The Mexican
programme.desc: A clumsy criminal gets placed in a position where he has to save himself and his girlfriend from the Mafia.

programme.title: Succession S3 Ep02
programme.desc: Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season 2, Logan Roy begins Season 3 in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances.

programme.title: Insecure S5 Ep01
programme.desc: The final season continues to follow our favorite characters as they evaluate their relationships, in an effort to figure out who and what comes with them in this next phase of their lives.

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm S11 Ep01
programme.desc: Larry David stars as...Larry David in this acclaimed verite-style comedy series that follows him at home, at work and around town, as he lands himself in various predicaments.

programme.title: Marley & Me
programme.desc: To have a taste of parenthood, a columnist and his wife adopted an incorrigible Labrador who will become an indispensable part of the family.

programme.title: Tenet

programme.title: Force of Nature

programme.desc: The Championship Race is about to start and all the fastest trucks in town are ready! But Crusher steals the trophy before the race even begins and it's up to Blaze and his friends to get it back in time.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep503
programme.desc: Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S2 Ep203
programme.desc: It's Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all of their friends are excited to 'Truck or Treat.' But when Crusher's plan to steal all of their candy goes awry, he sends their treats far away.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S5 Ep508
programme.desc: Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into Adventure Bay's cliffs!

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Sir Steel wants to go to the moon and gets Professor Scratch to convert Steel Towers into a space rocket!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep119
programme.desc: ROBO G takes Calvin on a deep sea adventure to find what he needs to finish his underwater artwork. But when a school of jellyfish blocks them, Calvin must summon his PLAY POWER to finish his masterpiece.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Someone (or something) has stolen the snacks for the spooky surprise party! It's up to Calvin and ROBO G to use their PLAY POWER to find them - if the mysterious 'Count Snackula' doesn't find them first.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep205
programme.desc: It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep120
programme.desc: It's Halloween! Paddington goes Treat or Treating with the kids but Mr. Curry does not want to join in...or does he? // Paddington wonders why trees lose their leaves, it does not happen in Peru.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep237
programme.desc: Peppa and George goes to Rebecca Rabbit's house. It's a bit different to Peppa's house; in a hill with tunnels instead of stairs. They enjoy playing and are surprised when George finds he likes carrots!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep238
programme.desc: Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chlo and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chlo have a great idea;

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep239
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are driving out to the countryside to go for a walk in the woods. Peppa and George discover trails of footprints left by little birds and ants.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep240
programme.desc: Suzy Sheep's pretend friend is called 'Leo Lion'. Peppa can't see Leo but Suzy says he likes to roar and dressup. Peppa decides that she can see Leo. Mummy and Daddy Pig play along, George feels left out.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep509
programme.desc: When Nonny, Gil and Zooli conjure a genie, she agrees to grant whoever brings her the most precious gift a wish. They think it might be a precious gem, but turns out it's friendship!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Blue's feeling sad, so we play Blue's Clues to figure out why. Along the way to figuring out Blue's Clues, we help our Felt Friends and Blues' friends from school learn to deal with emotions and feelings.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Josh is being silly but still can't get Blue to laugh! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what will make Blue laugh. We find patterns with a goofy gopher and locate all the mixed-up things in Silly Town.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep605
programme.desc: At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S4 Ep403
programme.desc: Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back. // Francois's trailer unhooked, and all of his critters have gotten loose!
